function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through Twitter feeds discussing loneliness and COVID-19.","Impact":"Increased risk of misinformation and panic related to contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement fact-checking and verification processes for Twitter feeds.","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools for real-time tracking and analysis.","People":"General population exposed to misinformation and panic-inducing content.","Owner":"Social media platforms and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Inadequate data preprocessing leading to inclusion of irrelevant Twitter feeds.","Impact":"Inaccurate analysis and interpretation of the Twitter data.","Mitigation":"Implement robust data preprocessing techniques and quality control measures.","Technologies":"Natural language processing (NLP) algorithms and machine learning models for text analysis.","People":"Data analysts and researchers responsible for data preprocessing.","Owner":"Data science teams and research institutions."},{"Description":"Limited geographical representation of Twitter feeds, specifically from regions with lower participation.","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of the global discourse on loneliness and COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Actively seek participation from underrepresented regions and demographics.","Technologies":"Social media outreach and targeted advertising tools for diverse audience engagement.","People":"Underrepresented regions and demographics excluded from the study.","Owner":"Research institutions and social media platforms."}]}
